sub_title: Experience Strategy Consultant at IBM iX
summary:
I enjoy working with my clients on creating better customer & employee experiences through digital solutions - I work from strategy definition to implementation of enterprise platforms.  Through my experience in different industries and countries I have developed a resilient mind-set, ability to build trusting relationships and to quickly learn what is needed in new situations. 

I am a Managing Consultant, with a bachelor degree in Production Engineering and masters degree in Innovation Management and Entrepreneurship.  I have experience in large digital transformation projects, with focus on agile transformation, change management, design thinking and product management. Some of the clients I’ve worked with are AB InBev, HEINEKEN and Shell.

awards.title: Sweden - Brazil: The Innovation Challenge 2015
awards.description:
Awarded as the second prize winner of the challenge, for showing skills and knowledge in current affairs, logical reasoning, sustainability and sustainable transportation.

The award ceremony was at CISB's Annual Meeting.
CISB: Swedish-Brazilian Research and Innovation Centre

profile_positions.description:
At IBM iX we work at the intersection of strategy, creativity, and technology to help our clients digitally reinvent their businesses.  My assignments include:

Delivery Lead for Shell:
- Responsible for Salesforce Sales and Marketing Cloud implementation
- Managed the IBM Garage team to envision and develop innovative and sustainable solutions for the mining industry
- Managed 2 SCRUM teams (20 FTE) including near-shore and off-shore resources
- Accountable for stakeholder, scope, resource and financial management of the projects

Change Management & Employee Experience Lead for AB InBev
- Ensured an employee-centric approach in their HR transformation
- Re-designed the client engagement approach from face-to-face to virtual 
- Co-created and implemented with my counterpart the stakeholder management initiatives of senior leaders (VPs, C-level)
- Defined and implemented the communication strategy to drive readiness and prepare end users for the go-live (7 Zones, 160,000 employees)
- Defined strategy and implemented activities to engage with end users to ensure adoption of the new system
- Defined KPIs to measure the readiness of the end users towards the system go live

Agile Coach for The HEINEKEN Company 
- Coached teams that were going through their Agile Transformation journey

Partner Product Owner for France Boissons 
- Worked closely with the client in coaching Agile ways of working & defining the product vision and ensuring the best experience to the end users through the digital solution we built
- I was the link between business and IT, and translated the business requirements into user stories
- Managed the product backlog and drove the refinement & estimation sessions with the distributed development team (nearshore & offshore)
 
Additionally, I have led several Design Thinking workshops, I am active in the Women in Tech network and various other internal initiatives - I have fun being an intrapreneur at IBM!
profile_positions.title: Managing Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Scrum Master for France Boissons 
- In the peak of the project I was managing two SCRUM teams (21 people) distributed teams
- It was a Pan-European B2B Ecommerce Program and I was involved in the end-to-end implementation of SAP Commerce Cloud

President of the Young IBM Community in the Netherlands
- Represented the Young IBM community for the IBM Benelux Corporate Leadership Team
- Organised various networking events for both IBMers & external clients
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant

profile_positions.description:
The purpose of the master thesis was to investigate how traditional companies in the white goods sector can upgrade and improve their post-purchase offerings through the use of digital technologies. 

This was done through an analysis of startups and traditional companies to identify what they are doing in their post-purchase phase for customer engagement, and analyse what could be applicable for an incumbent in the white goods sector. 

The companies analysed were: 
   - Startups: Detectify, Lifesum, Natural Cycles, Spotify, Sqore, Star Stables, Swedish Stockings and Virtusize
   - Incumbents: BMW, Miele and Nespresso

The commissioner of this thesis was the Digital Marketing EMEA Department at Electrolux.
profile_positions.title: Digital Technology Researcher

profile_positions.description:
I represented Stockholm School of Entrepreneurship (SSES) at the Royal Institute of Technology (KTH) where I was engaging with students, student organisations and departments in offering and exposing the SSES portfolio of activities wherever relevant. My focus was on discovering and creating opportunities to reach the students at KTH.

The Stockholm School of Entrepreneurship is an independent non-profit organisation providing education, training, and inspiration in applied interdisciplinary entrepreneurship to five member universities in Stockholm. To complement the academic course portfolio, SSES also curates a range of extra-curricular activities for hands-on student training in topics relevant to students and entrepreneurs.
profile_positions.title: Business Development

profile_positions.description:
Worked in the Product Development and Business Growth Department of Bancoob - The Cooperative Bank of Brazil.

My role was business analyst responsible for the implementation of first Mortgage Product of the bank. In that role, I was responsible for:
- Ensure regulatory compliance with laws, policies and regulations defined by the Central Bank of Brazil and the Government of Brazil 
- Worked with business to map the brand new process, identify the requirements from each department involved  in this new process, and alignment with management team to ensure change management is in place.
- Point of contact with IT Supplier, providing the business requirements and testing the platform.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
100 Open Startups is a corporate-startup engagement platform created and maintained by more than 100 global leading organizations that together evaluate and rank startups worldwide for business generation.

In my role, I was mainly responsible for:
- Engage with potential customers (executives & entrepreneurs) and building relationships with the existing clients 
- Responsible for the growth of the community: By having the face to face and virtual interaction with the audience, and through data analysis, I’ve gained deeper understanding of our community which enabled us to improve the process.
profile_positions.title: Community Manager

profile_positions.company: SENAI - Serviço Nacional de Aprendizagem Industrial
profile_positions.description:
Intern at the Innovation and Technology Unit

- Supported the different phases of the annual development of the SENAI Innovation Call, focusing on the Monitoring and Controlling phase;
- Developed a decision-making support tool for consolidating and releasing the monthly unit performance, which reduced the processing time by 80%.

During this time, I competed in the 2nd Grand Prix SENAI of Innovation: 72h of Innovation Race.
profile_positions.title: Junior Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
University projects accelerator, which aims to bring the university and the industry closer together, aiming to provide opportunities for students and develop of the business environment in Brasília.

- Part of the team who organized the 1st and 2nd edition of the job fair at University of Brasília
- General coordinator of the 4th edition of the job fair 
- Contacted companies for display at the fair 
- Responsible for fundraising and establishing lifecycle relationship with sponsors

There were four successful editions, with more than 50 companies attending overall and more than 2,500 attendees per edition, who together rated the event higher than 90%.

*Due to my study abroad I have been absent from Integrar in 2013.
profile_positions.title: President

profile_positions.description:
- Led a 15-people team in organizing a first time event at University of Brasília
- Supervision of the logistics, programming, commercial and communication activities.

There were 16 talks, 20 sponsor companies, more than 1,200 applications for attending and more than 4,500 likes on the Facebook page.
profile_positions.title: General Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Castle Precision Engineering has worked in six different sectors along its history, those being aerospace, defence, electronic, energy, petrochemical and automotive. In the 21st century, they became experts in the aerospace sector producing high precision parts to major customers in this niche market.

- Worked on a project which required to investigate, process, analyze, organize and understand a very significant amount of information about a specialist manufacturing field
- Made a commercial proposal and recommendation to the board that delivered a real business plan.
profile_positions.title: Summer Internship

profile_positions.description:
Grupo Gestão is a junior enterprise of the Production Engineering course at University of Brasília.

- Led a 3-people team
- Created strategies to increase the number of customers 
- Developed a CRM strategy
- Set up partnerships with other companies
profile_positions.title: Commercial Director

profile_positions.description:
Grupo Gestão is a junior enterprise of the Production Engineering course at University of Brasília.

- Led a 2-people team
- Developed strategies to promote Grupo Gestão’s brand 
- Improved the relationship with stakeholders
profile_positions.title: Marketing Director

profile_positions.description:
Grupo Gestão is a junior enterprise of the Production Engineering course at University of Brasília.

- Worked on daily activities from the Marketing and Human Resource areas
- Worked on a stock management project at the company Só Reparos (Brasília, Brazil)
- Interviewed people for a project with AGR-CEFTRU
- Had  some training related to Consultancy, Microsoft Office Suite, Leadership and SAS Business Analytics software
profile_positions.title: Consultant
